description: Gu Yanshu and Shen Jue had been at odds when they debuted in a teenage boy band. After surviving the lashing out from the whole Internet, the boy band disbanded and they two both went solo. One became a top-notch singer, the other became the film emperor, and they hadn’t been in the same picture for five whole years. Then, rumours appeared that film emperor Shen was h*mophobic and disliked Gu Yanshu, so they’d rather go the hell than meet each other again…>
